title: E-Learning Security Design Course Utilizing Hybrid Encryption

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course aiming to integrate linguistics and computer science education, conducting project-based assessments in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components of hybrid encryption systems (RSA+AES) and analyze practical implementation cases
Learners can design processes to protect educational content using BCIE compression algorithms and SCELL encryption techniques
Learners can develop systems to safeguard language learning content from unauthorized access by implementing a two-stage compression-encryption process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
